article_title: Hayworth, Maloney take swings in debate
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: MIDDLETOWN – With two weeks to go in their second scrap for Congress, U.S. Rep. Sean Patrick Maloney and Republican challenger Nan Hayworth traded jabs in a joint interview Tuesday as they debated policies such as the Affordable Care Act, touted their accomplishments in Congress and combatted claims each has made about the another in their recent campaign encounters.Maloney, a Cold Spring Democrat who unseated Hayworth in 2012, counted his collaboration with Republicans at various
article_metadata.author: Chris McKenna Times Herald-Record
